title: How many 500 thousands are in 2 billion? (How many times, like let’s say something costs 500 thousand and you all in all pay so it becomes 2 billion how many times did you pay for it?) - Quora

response.answer_text: The easy way to do this is to think first how many 500 thousands in a million? The answer is 2. Then how many millions in a billion ? That is a thousand. So there are 2000 millions in 2 billion. And finally there are 2 x 2000 500 thousands = 4000 500 hundred thousands in 2 billion.
500 thousand is 1/2 Million. 1 Billion is 1,000 Million, 2B is 2,000 Million. Two 500 Thousand each Million, so that’s 4,000 500 thousands in 2 billion. You paid for it four thousand times.
